author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Perma Fix Medical: Changes In Management And Supervisory Board
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - PERMA FIX MEDICAL SA:
* SAID ON FRIDAY THAT LOUIS CENTOFANTI RESIGNED FROM POST OF CHAIRMAN OF COMPANYâ€˜S SUPERVISORY BOARD EFFECTIVE AS OF JAN. 31
* SUPERVISORY BOARD APPOINTED LOUIS CENTOFANTI NEW CEO OF COMPANY EFFECTIVE AS OF FEB. 1
* PREVIOUS CEO, STEPHEN BELCHER, HAS BEEN APPOINTED MEMBER OF SUPERVISORY BOARD EFFECTIVE AS OF FEB.1
Source texts for Eikon:,
